documentation.text: @notice Retires a pensioner at the current block timestamp

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Date must be a future one"

arguments.value: Date must be a future one

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Date must be a future one"

documentation.text:
@notice Changes a pensioner retirement date
 @dev We substract one just in case block.timestamp doesnt change when performing the next operation

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Pensioner must be active to contribute"

arguments.value: Pensioner must be active to contribute

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Pensioner must be active to contribute"

documentation.text:
@notice Adds a contribution to the total amount contributed by the pensioner
 @param amount The new value to be added to the total amount
@notice Returns the date at which the pensioner will stop receiving funds
@notice Returns whether a pensioner is retired or not
@notice Returns whether a pension is inside his benefit duration

natspec.author: Alvaro Sánchez García
natspec.details: This contract is intended to be run with PensionSystem.sol

addContribution(uint256).notice: Adds a contribution to the total amount contributed by the pensioner

params.amount: The new value to be added to the total amount

params._benefitDuration: Timestamp representing the amount of time the pensioner will be elegible for benefits
params._retireAtDate: Timestamp at which the new pensioner wants to retire

getFinishPensionTime().notice: Returns the date at which the pensioner will stop receiving funds

isInsideBenefitDuration().notice: Returns whether a pension is inside his benefit duration

isPensionerRetired().notice: Returns whether a pensioner is retired or not

setRetirement(uint256).details: We substract one just in case block.timestamp doesnt change when performing the next operation

setRetirementNow().notice: Retires a pensioner at the current block timestamp

natspec.notice: All timestamps are expressed using Unix time https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_timeAll durations are expressed in seconds
natspec.title: A representation of a pensioner
